data.comment: The match has started.
Carlinhos Junior (Shimizu) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 3, Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
Throw-in Shimizu.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shimizu's Kenta Nishizawa is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 9, Shimizu takes a corner from the right.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Shota Kaneko (Shimizu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Shimizu drive upfield and Carlinhos Junior gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kobe defender.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shimizu's half?
In the minute 16, Kobe have a goal kick.
Free kick for Kobe in the half of Shimizu.
Kobe are pushing forward but Yuta Goke's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
In the minute 29, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Kobe.
Hotaru Yamaguchi puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
That's a fine assist from Dyanfrez Douglas.
In the minute 34, Shimizu are coming forward and Yusuke Goto gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Dyanfrez Douglas of Kobe gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Shimizu at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kobe.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Shimizu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kobe's half?
In the minute 40, Shimizu takes a corner from the right.
Shimizu are whistled for offside.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, In Shizuoka a free kick has been awarded the home team.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Sergi Samper.
In the minute 51, The away team replace Sergi Samper with Takuya Yasui.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Free kick Kobe.
In the minute 58, It's a goal kick for the home team in Shizuoka.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
Shimizu drives forward and Kenta Nishizawa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 60, Yusuke Goto of Shimizu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Valdo.
In the minute 60, Kenta Nishizawa with an assist there.
Throw-in Kobe.
Kobe pushes forward through Dankler, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 65, Kobe takes a corner from the left.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Keita Nakamura is replacing Shota Kaneko for the home team.
In the minute 71, Yuito Suzuki is on a sub for Yusuke Goto for Shimizu.
Kobe make their second substitution with Noriaki Fujimoto replacing Junya Tanaka.
Kobe make their third substitution with Keijiro Ogawa replacing Yuta Goke.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Shimizu in the half of Kobe.
Shimizu takes a corner from the right.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
In the minute 76, Shimizu take a 2-1 lead thanks to Elsinho.
Great play from Kenta Nishizawa to set up the goal.
The home team replace Ryo Takeuchi with Hikaru Naruoka.
In the minute 79, Carlinhos Junior for Shimizu is whistled offside.
Shimizu's Kenta Nishizawa misses with an attempt on goal.
Kobe have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Keita Nakamura (Shimizu) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Kobe defenders.
Yuito Suzuki of Shimizu gets in a strike, but is off target.
Throw-in for Kobe at IAI Stadium Nihondaira.
In the minute 84, Free kick Shimizu.
Dankler (Kobe) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Kobe are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 85, Shimizu needs to be cautious. Kobe have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Shimizu in the half of Kobe.
Shimizu move into a 3-1 lead through a Takashi Kanai header.
In the minute 87, Kenta Nishizawa instrumental with a fine assist.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Andres Iniesta of Kobe is pulled up for offside.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
Kota Miyamoto is on a sub for Carlinhos Junior for Shimizu.
The home team replace Elsinho with Yugo Tatsuta.
